Title: Initial D: Third Stage
Writer: Nobuaki Kishima, Shuichi Shigeno (comic: Initial D), Hiroshi Toda
Actors: Chris Ayres, Greg Ayres, Christopher Bevins, Steve Blum
Plot: More races and challenges for soon-to-be-graduate/drift racer Takumi Fujiwara. Of course, with all the bells and whistles of a big screen production.
